sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-card class="form-card">
    <a-form
      model="form"
      :label-col="{ span: 4 }"
      :wrapper-col="{ span: 14 }"
      @submit.prevent="handleSubmit"
    >
      <a-form-item label="新用户名">
        <a-input v-model="form.username" placeholder="请输入新用户名" />
      </a-form-item>
      <a-form-item label="密码">
        <a-input
          type="password"
          v-model="form.password"
          placeholder="请输入密码"
        />
      </a-form-item>
      <a-form-item label="确认密码">
        <a-input
          type="password"
          v-model="form.confirmPassword"
          placeholder="请确认密码"
        />
      </a-form-item>
      <a-form-item label="员工密钥（可选）">
        <a-input
          v-model="form.employeeKey"
          placeholder="请输入员工密钥（如果适用）"
        />
      </a-form-item>
      <a-form-item label="手机号（可选）">
        <a-input v-model="form.phone" placeholder="请输入手机号（如果适用）" />
      </a-form-item>
      <a-form-item :wrapper-col="{ span: 12, offset: 4 }">
        <a-button type="primary" html-type="submit"> 提交 </a-button>
      </a-form-item>
    </a-form>
  </a-card>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent, reactive } from "vue";

export default defineComponent({
  setup() {
    const form = reactive({
      username: "",
      password: "",
      confirmPassword: "",
      employeeKey: "",
      phone: "",
    });

    function handleSubmit() {
      // 这里应该是表单提交的逻辑，比如调用API
      console.log("Form submitted:", form);
      // 可以在这里添加验证逻辑
    }

    return {
      form,
      handleSubmit,
    };
  },
});
</script>

<style>
.form-card {
  max-width: 600px;
  margin: 20px auto;
}
</style>
